sen.j: 春峯庵事件（しゅんぽうあんじけん）は昭和初期に起こった肉筆浮世絵の大規模な偽造事件である。
sen.e: The scandal of Shunpoan is the large-scale criminal case of counterfeited hand-painted Ukiyo-e, which occurred in the early Showa period around 1930s.

sen.e: The scandal of Shunpoan is the large-scale criminal case of counterfeit hand-painted Ukiyo-e (Japanese woodblock prints), which occurred in the early Showa period around 1930s.

sen.j: 1934年東京美術倶楽部で、春峯庵なる旧家の所蔵品という触れ込みで東洲斎写楽、喜多川歌麿などの肉筆浮世絵の入札会が開かれた。
sen.e: In 1934, there was a public auction at Tokyo Art Club for inviting the bids for the hand-painted Ukiyo-e owned by a good old family called Shunpoan, whose art works were claimed to be produced by Sharaku TOSHUSAI or Utamaro KITAGAWA.
